TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISessionIDManager

summary.span: 定义自定义会话状态标识符管理器必须实现的协定。

span.span: Defines the contract that a custom session-state identifier manager must implement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口标识为会话标识符值创建自定义管理器必须实现的方法。The interface identifies the methods that you must implement to create a custom manager for session-identifier values. 接口实现创建并验证会话标识符值，并管理 HTTP 响应中会话标识符的存储，以及从 HTTP 请求中检索会话标识符值。An interface implementation creates and validates session-identifier values, and manages the storage of a session identifier in the HTTP response as well as the retrieval of a session-identifier value from the HTTP request. 使用[SessionState 元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/h6bb9cz9(v=vs.100))配置元素的 `sessionIDManagerType` 属性启用自定义会话 ID 管理器。You enable the custom session-ID manager using the `sessionIDManagerType` attribute of the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/h6bb9cz9(v=vs.100)) configuration element. 如果 接口实现将支持无 cookie 会话标识符，则需要实现用于在 URL 中发送和检索会话标识符的解决方案，如 ISAPI 筛选器。If your interface implementation will support cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter. 如果你只想要提供 ASP.NET 会话状态要使用的自定义会话标识符值，则可以创建一个继承 类的类，并只使用你自己的自定义实现来重写 和 方法。If you only want to supply custom session-identifier values to be used by ASP.NET session state, you can create a class that inherits the class and override only the and methods with your own custom implementation. 这使你可以提供自己的会话标识符值，同时依赖于基础 类将值存储到 HTTP 响应，并从 HTTP 请求中检索值。This enables you to supply your own session-identifier values, while relying on the base class to store values to the HTTP response and retrieve values from the HTTP request. 有关重写 类和实现这些方法的示例，请参阅 类的 方法的示例。For an example of overriding the class and implementing these methods, see the example provided for the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个实现基于 cookie 的会话 ID 管理器的类。The following code example shows a class that implements a cookie-based session-ID manager. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建一个唯一的会话标识符。

span.span: Creates a unique session identifier.
A unique session identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于生成唯一会话标识符， 对象将使用该标识符来标识新会话。The method is used to generate a unique session identifier that the object will use to identify a new session. 返回的值必须唯一，并且必须包含可在 HTTP 响应和请求中存储的有效字符。The value returned by must be unique and must contain valid characters that can be stored in an HTTP response and request. 如果 实现返回的值可能包含在 HTTP 响应或请求中无效的字符，则应使用 方法对 方法实现中的会话标识符值进行编码，并使用 方法对 方法实现中的会话标识符值进行解码。If it is possible that the value returned by your implementation contains characters that are not valid in an HTTP response or request, you should use the method to encode the session-identifier value in your method implementation and the method to decode the session-identifier value in your method implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 方法。The following code example implements the method. 方法创建一个要用作会话标识符的新 。The method creates a new to be used as a session identifier. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#3)]

summary.span: 从当前 HTTP 请求的上下文中获取会话标识符。

span.span: Gets the session identifier from the context of the current HTTP request.

returns.span: 随 HTTP 请求一起发送的当前会话标识符。

span.span: The current session identifier sent with the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 和 事件期间 调用 方法。The method is called by the during the and events. 如果无法从 HTTP 请求中检索有效会话标识符，请返回 `null`。If you cannot retrieve a valid session identifier from the HTTP request, return `null`. 如果 从 方法接收 `null`，它将调用 方法来获取新会话的新会话标识符。If the receives `null` from the method, it will call the method to get a new session identifier for a new session. 如果 实现返回的值可能包含在 HTTP 响应或请求中无效的字符，则应使用 方法对 方法实现中的会话标识符值进行编码，并使用 方法对 方法实现中的会话标识符值进行解码。If it is possible that the value returned by your implementation contains characters that are not valid in an HTTP response or request, you should use the method to encode the session-identifier value in your method implementation and the method to decode the session-identifier value in your method implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个部分实现的 方法。The following code example shows a partially implemented method. 如果自定义会话 ID 管理器支持无 cookie 会话标识符，你将需要实现用于在 URL 中发送和检索会话标识符的解决方案，如 ISAPI 筛选器。If your custom session-ID manager supports cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#2)]

Public Function InitializeRequest (context As HttpContext, suppressAutoDetectRedirect As Boolean, ByRef supportSessionIDReissue As Boolean) As Boolean
public: bool InitializeRequest(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context, bool suppressAutoDetectRedirect, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % supportSessionIDReissue);
abstract member InitializeRequest : System.Web.HttpContext * bool * bool -> bool

param.name: context
param.span: 包含有关当前请求的信息的 对象。

span.span: The object that contains information about the current request.

param.name: suppressAutoDetectRedirect
param.span: 如果会话标识符管理器必须重定向来确定 Cookie 支持，则为 ；否则为 ，以取消确定 Cookie 支持的自动重定向。

span.span: if the session-ID manager should redirect to determine cookie support; otherwise, to suppress automatic redirection to determine cookie support.

param.name: supportSessionIDReissue
param.span: 该方法返回时会包含一个布尔值，指示原始 ID 过期后 对象是否支持发出新的会话 ID。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a Boolean that indicates whether the object supports issuing new session IDs when the original ID is out of date.

param.span: 此参数在传递时尚未初始化。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.span: 当会话状态 ID 在 URL 上被编码，或者存在 URL 被共享或传送的可能性时，重复使用会话 ID 是合理的做法。

span.span: Session ID reuse is appropriate when the session-state ID is encoded on a URL and the potential exists for the URL to be shared or emailed.

param.span: 如果自定义会话状态实现按虚拟路径将 Cookie 分区，则同样应支持会话状态。

span.span: If a custom session-state implementation partitions cookies by virtual path, session state should also be supported.

summary.span: 针对每个请求执行 对象的初始化。

span.span: Performs per-request initialization of the object.

returns.span: 如果初始化执行了重定向，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to indicate that the initialization performed a redirect; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 对象处理的每个请求调用 方法。The method is called for each request handled by the object. 使用 方法可初始化 对象的每个请求的数据。Use the method to initialize per-request data for the object. 当 `true``suppressAutoDetectRedirect` 参数时， 对象不应使用 "重定向" 来确定浏览器是否支持 cookie。When the `suppressAutoDetectRedirect` parameter is `true`, the object should not use redirection to determine whether the browser supports cookies. 如果使用 cookie 进行会话标识，应返回 `supportSessionIDReissue` 参数 `false`;否则，如果你的 实现支持重新发出会话 Id，则返回 `true`。The `supportSessionIDReissue` parameter should be returned `false` if cookies are used for session identification; otherwise, return `true` if your implementation supports re-issuing session IDs.

summary.span: 将新创建的会话标识符保存到 HTTP 响应。

span.span: Saves a newly created session identifier to the HTTP response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 事件期间， 对象调用 方法。The method is called by the object during the event. 方法将会话标识符存储在 URL 中（使用无 cookie 会话状态时），或存储在非过期会话 cookie 中。The method stores the session identifier either in the URL (when cookieless session state is used) or in a non-expiring session cookie. 如果从 实现返回的值可能包含在 HTTP 响应或请求中无效的字符，则应使用 方法对 方法实现中的会话标识符值进行编码，并使用 方法对 方法实现中的会话标识符值进行解码。If it is possible that the value returned from your implementation contains characters that are not valid in an HTTP response or request, you should use the method to encode the session-identifier value in your method implementation and the method to decode the session-identifier value in your method implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个部分实现的 方法。The following code example shows a partially implemented method. 如果自定义会话 ID 管理器支持无 cookie 会话标识符，你将需要实现用于在 URL 中发送和检索会话标识符的解决方案，如 ISAPI 筛选器。If your custom session-ID manager supports cookieless session identifiers, you will need to implement a solution for sending and retrieving session identifiers in the URL, such as an ISAPI filter. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/CS/isessionidmodulesnippets.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.ISessionIDModule/VB/isessionidmodulesnippets.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法验证提供的 `id` 是否为有效的会话标识符。The method verifies that the supplied `id` is a valid session identifier. 从 HTTP 请求检索会话标识符时， 实现应从 方法调用 方法，以确保所提供的会话标识符的格式正确。Your implementation should call the method from the method when retrieving a session identifier from an HTTP request to ensure that the supplied session identifier is properly formatted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 方法，并确保会话标识符值为有效 。The following code example implements the method and ensures the session-identifier value is a valid .
